page.title: 14Nercwys & Eryrys - Services
page.content: This is a rural area with limited services. Piped water is available to all, mostly mains but some private. There is a mains sewer in Eryrys, elsewhere drainage is private. Mains electricity is available to all. Bus services are limited, a service between Wrexham and Mold passes through the north east corner of the area 4 times daily. Eryrys has a return bus one day a week to Mold and return buses 3 days a week to Wrexham. Most people travel by car. Main shopping is usually done in Mold and Wrexham. Village shops used are in Eryrys, Nercwys, Treuddyn, Llanarmon and Maeshafn. In Eryrys and Treuddyn there are sub post offices. The area is served by doctors in Ruthun, Mold and Treuddyn, there are hospitals in Ruthun, Mold and Wrexham. There are police in near by villages.
